name: Heros Archer Survival Assassin
description:
Heros Archer Survival Assassin is simple yet addicting game play, giving you thrilling moments and an unexpected experience. In this game, you play as arashi, a former legendary ninja who fights his way through the corrupted world to save his kidnapped son from the hand of the devil Orochi.
Feature:
1- Play Super Arrow Shooting action game for free.
2- 3D Natural Castle Environment
3- Realistic Physics of archery
4- Real-time 3D ninja archery animations & samurai wars
5- Simple but Beautiful Graphical User Interface
